actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Air Force to enter into long term contracts for the lease of a limited number of housing units at or near not more than five Air Force installations for the purpose of providing badly needed family housing for Air Force personnel, and for other purposes.
short_title: Air Force Family Housing Build-Lease Act of 1982

summary.text: Air Force Family Housing Build - Lease Act of 1982 - Permits the Secretary of the Air Force to lease housing facilities for assignment without charge to specified members of the armed forces. Limits such leases as to length, number, number of locations, and per unit monthly cost. Requires the Secretary to give the Armed Services Committee 21 days notice of any such contract.

titles.title: Air Force Family Housing Build-Lease Act of 1982

A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Air Force to enter into long term contracts for the lease of a limited number of housing units at or near not more than five Air Force installations for the purpose of providing badly needed family housing for Air Force personnel, and for other purposes.
